data.eml:eml: A revision of the lysianassid genus Waldeckia with the description of four new species (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae, Waldeckiinae subfam. nov.)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lowry, J. K., Kilgallen, N. M. (2014): A revision of the lysianassid genus Waldeckia with the description of four new species (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae, Waldeckiinae subfam. nov.). Zootaxa 3784 (4): 301-345, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.4.1
